resources.string: Confused about which tech domain to choose and how to even progress ahead in it!?\n\nDon’t you worry, we’ve got you covered!
STC app gives you domain wise extremely well structured roadmaps and detailed resources for every topic to help you in your journey from a total beginner to an amazing pro!
Welcome to the STC app!\nWe are equally excited for you to know more about us, while we both learn and grow together!
The data may vary with location and population changes
